fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
Depending on the time in the **Clocktower**, this card has different effects
 - 0 hours: When played, you may give a person a Splinter ( <:brown:1107516362903007232> ) (1187).
 - 1 - 4 hours: When played, you may give 4 Splinter ( <:brown:1107516362903007232> ) (1187) to whomever you please.
 - 5 - 8 hours: Once its chopped down, convert the wood into 3 **Shield**. You may also choose to add a <:red:1106234051129507932> color to one of your cards.
 - 9+ hours: When played, you may craft an **Ethereal** Sharp Sword (1623) with a <:red:1106234051129507932> color attached to it.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:brown:1107516362903007232> ):
fields.value:
Depending on the time in the **Clocktower**, this card has different effects
 - 0 - 4 hours: When played, you may give 5 Splinter ( <:brown:1107516362903007232> ) (1187).
 - 5 - 8 hours: Once its chopped down, convert the wood into 4 **Shield**. You may also choose to add a <:red:1106234051129507932> + <:brown:1107516362903007232> color to one of your cards.
 - 9+ hours: When played, you may craft 2 **Ethereal** Sharp Sword (1623)s with a <:gray:1107516393450127411> color added to it.
